source.instructions: Construct a program that swaps the values of variables x and y using the helper variable z. You can change the names of the variables () by clicking them.
source.name: variable 2
source.options:
{
      "sortableId": "sortable",
      "trashId": "sortableTrash",
      "vartests": [{"initcode": "x = 1\ny=2", "code": "", "message": "Testing with initial variable values x = 1 and y = 2", "variables": {"z": 3, "x": 2, "y": 1}},
                   {"initcode": "x = 3\ny=4\n", "code": "", "message": "Testing with initial variable values x = 3 and y = 4", "variables": {"z": 7, "x": 4, "y": 3}}],
      "lang": "en"
    }
